Title: Relates to a study to determine the possibility of closing peaker plants throughout the state
Summary: Authorizes and directs the public service commission and the energy research and development authority to conduct a study to determine the possibility of closing peaker plants throughout the state.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the public service commission and the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a study to determine the possibility of closing peaker plant electric generating facilities; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
